properties.tooltip: The name of the column that will be the input of the Bucketizer process.
The name of the column that will be the output of the Bucketizer process.

(comma separated values) Split points for mapping continuous features into buckets. With n+1 splits, there are n buckets. A bucket defined by splits x,y holds values in the range [x,y) except the last bucket, which also includes y. The splits should be of length >= 3 and strictly increasing. Values at -inf, inf must be explicitly provided to cover all Double values; otherwise, values outside the splits specified will be treated as errors.
How to handle invalid entries. Options are skip (filter out rows with invalid values), error (throw an error), or keep (keep invalid values in a special additional bucket).
